msContents.summary: Tax register for payments of the syntaximon for the year 29-30 AD; names are arranged alphabetically with name, patronymic and occupation or some other descriptive epithet; on average, twelve names were entered in each column; the roll has a series of checks and marginal notations; two sloping parallel indicate that payment has been made in full; before several names a single dot appears, perhaps indicating that the entry had been checked against that in a day book; marginal notations indicate persons who have fled and those who are exempt from taxation

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; verso published as P.Princ. 10
Seven columns: col. I, 26 lines; col. II, 36 lines; col. III, 24 lines; col. IV, 27 lines; col. V, 28 lines; col. VI, 29 lines; col. VII, 12 lines;
Col. V severely damaged; only marginal notations of col. VII remain
Some lines are preceded by notations such as a raised dot or colon, in addition to double slashes apparently used to indicate payment in full.

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

III] Heron s. of Apollonios fruit-buyer, through the bank, 16th year, month of Choiak; 21st 4 dr.; // Herakles s. of Hatres s. of Didymos, through the bank, 16th year, 23rd of Mechir 20 dr.; 23rd of Pharmouthi 8 dr., 21st of Pachon 12 dr., 22nd of Epiph 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, pig-tax 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 5] 21st of Epiph 4 dr.; // Heras s . of Heliodoros, through the bank, 16th year, 24th of Mechir 24 dr.; 19th of Pauni 12 dr., 25th of Mesore 8 dr. 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, pig-tax 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herodoes s. of Herakles s. of Taskini- [hand 2] in Alexandria; ((15th of Pauni 12 dr.)); [l. 10] [in marg.] from the agreement, // Herakles s. of Mysthas s. of Theogeiton, through the bank, 16th year, 17th of Mechir 12 dr.; // Herakles s. of Megalankomos s. of Postimos s. of Tib-, through the bank, 16th year, Mechir; . . . 24 dr., l- 5 4 dr., 22nd of Phamenoth 8 dr. 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, pig-tax 1 dr. 1 ob., 14th of Pachon 8 dr; // Herakles s. of Mysthas s. of Phanias, through the bank, 16th year, l- 5 month of New Sebastos 4 dr.; 7th of Tybi 16 dr., 19th of Tybi 4 dr., 24th of Pharmouthi 4 dr.; [l. 15] 14th of Pachon 12 dr., l- m- 5 Pauni 4 dr. 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, pig-tax 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herakles also called Pnepheros s. of Ammonios; // Heras s. of Heras stepson of Koskonios, through the bank, 16th year, 14th of Mechir 24 dr.; 19th of Pauni 12 dr., 14th of Epiph 8 dr. 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, pig-tax 1 dr. 1 ob.; [in marg.] owed, Herakles s. of Herakles s. of Selenchis. Epeiph 18th one dr., total 1 dr.; Epeiph sixteen, total 16 dr. and pig-tax one ob., total 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herakles s. of Horos s. of Seratis weaver, through the bank, 16th year, 13th of Tybi 8 dr.; [The following line written upside down] 2.
